subject: Football
lead_paragraph: On an afternoon when the Giants’ defense had six sacks, two fumble recoveries, two interceptions and five passes knocked down, Osi  Umenyiora finished with the lion’s share.
snippet: On an afternoon when the Giants’ defense had six sacks, two fumble recoveries, two interceptions and five passes knocked down, Osi  Umenyiora finished with the lion’s share.
